channel.title: comics on Cortically Magnified
channel.description: Recent content in comics on Cortically Magnified

item.description: This is an illustration of the “Brain Sea”. I found it near the end of a comic book by the Taiwanese artist Push. What is the Brain Sea? In Mandarin Chinese, “Brain Sea” is a common expression that refers to the mind. This is the end scene of the “Nine Life Man” saga. The protagonist, who has been reincarnated into countless life forms in the 3 volume saga, asks the ultimate question: what is the point of all this?
